perfumes.name: Chanel No. 5
perfumes.description: An iconic floral fragrance with notes of rose, jasmine, and ylang-ylang.

perfumes.name: Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue
perfumes.description: A fresh, fruity-floral scent with hints of Sicilian cedar and apple.

perfumes.name: Yves Saint Laurent Black Opium
perfumes.description: A modern, rock-inspired fragrance with notes of coffee, vanilla, and white flowers.

perfumes.name: Giorgio Armani Acqua Di Gio
perfumes.description: A refreshing, aquatic fragrance with notes of marine, citrus, and cedar.
